SEARCH
Package cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models

Interface IGameBoard

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbsGameBoard, GameBoard, GameBoardMem
public interface IGameBoard
IGameBoard represents a board of characters Initialization ensures: A gameboard is created Defines: None Constraints: There can be no indices between player tokens that contain a ' '

  • Method Details

    • checkIfFree

      default boolean checkIfFree(int c)
      Function that will check the row values at a column and return true if a row is empty and false if not.
      Parameters:
      c - number that represents a column
      Returns:
      true if topmost row in column c contains a blank space, else false

    • dropToken

      void dropToken(char p, int c)

    • checkForWin

      default boolean checkForWin(int c)
      Function that will return a truth value representing whether or not the player token has resulted in the player winning the game.
      Parameters:
      c - number that represents column
      Returns:
      [true if any of the checkDirectionWin() functions evaluate to true with the boardPosition of the last token placed]

    • checkTie

      default boolean checkTie()
      This function will check if a play has resulted in a tie. It will do this by checking for any empty positions. If there are no empty positions the game will return true and false if there are empty positions.
      Returns:
      If the board is completely full, return true, else return false

    • checkHorizWin

      default boolean checkHorizWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      Function will check if the last token played has resulted in a number equal to MAX_IN_A_ROW of the same player's tokens being adjacent on the same row. If so the function will return true indicating that the player that laid the token has won, and false if not.
      Parameters:
      pos - object indicating spot where last token was placed
      p - character indicating the last players token
      Returns:
      true if getNumToWin() of the same player tokens are lined up horizontally without any blank spaces or other tokens in between, else return false

    • checkVertWin

      default boolean checkVertWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      Function will check if the last token played has resulted in a number equal to MAX_IN_A_ROW of the same player's tokens being adjacent on the same column. If so the function will return true indicating that the player that laid the token has won, and false if not.
      Parameters:
      pos - object indicating spot where last token was placed
      p - character indicating the last players token
      Returns:
      true if getNumToWin() of the same player tokens are lined up vertically without any blank spaces or other tokens in between, else return false

    • checkDiagWin

      default boolean checkDiagWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      Function will check if the last token played has resulted in a number equal to getNumToWin() of the same player's tokens being adjacent on a diagonal strip. If so the function will return true indicating that the player that laid the token has won, and false if not.
      Parameters:
      pos - object indicating spot where last token was placed
      p - character indicating the last players token
      Returns:
      true if player has matched getNumToWin() token diagonally on all directions OR false if the player has not had a match

    • whatsAtPos

      char whatsAtPos(BoardPosition pos)
      Function that will return the value of the specified pos
      Parameters:
      pos - the position that we are checking for if there is marker
      Returns:
      character or a blank space at pos

    • isPlayerAtPos

      default boolean isPlayerAtPos(BoardPosition pos, char player)
      Function that will check if a specific token is at position and return true if it is and false if it is not.
      Parameters:
      pos - object indicating spot on board
      player - character indicating the players token
      Returns:
      Returns 1 if the player is at pos, returns false if the player is not at pos

      int getNumRows()

    • getNumColumns

      int getNumColumns()

      int getNumToWin()
